type.name: characterized_class_of_physical_object
type.description: A characterized_class_of_physical_object is a Class_of_activity or a Class_of_product.

description.p: A Property_condition is a relationship between an Independent_property_definition and a class of physical object, and that indicates each member of the class has the property.
The class of physical object can be either a Class_of_product or a Class_of_activity.

ul.li: the Range_property_definition that is 9.999 to 10.001 Kg; and
the Class_of_product that is widget type XYZ_1234,

example.p: that indicates the mass of each widget of the type lies within the range, is a Property_condition.

explicit.name: base_independent_property
explicit.description: an Independent_property_definition that is possessed by each member of the described_element.
